title: Two-loop Quarkonium Hamiltonian in Non-annihilation Channel
authors: Go Mishima, Yukinari Sumino, Hiromasa Takaura
abstract:
We calculate the two-loop heavy quarkonium Hamiltonian within potential-NRQCD
effective field theory in the non-annihilation channel. This calculation
represents the first non-trivial step towards determining the N$^4$LO
Hamiltonian in the weak coupling regime. To cope with the large amount of
calculations, we make use of the $\beta$ expansion and differential equation
for master integrals and systematize the procedure.
